title: The Stand: Hardcases (2010) #5
description:
THE STAND: HARDCASES #5 (of 5) Written by ROBERTO AGUIRRE-SACASA Penciled by MIKE PERKINS Cover by TOMM COKER
It is the eve of the most important night in Boulder Free Zone history, and Mother Abagail is still missing... As Stu leads a desperate search for her, suspicions drive Frannie into taking a terrible risk, while Harold, gun heavy in his pocket, weighs a terrible choice... Stand up and be counted, True Believer, as HARDCASES draws to its pulse-pouding conclusion, leading to this epic, acclaimed adaptation's most explosive chapter yet! Script by ROBERTO AGUIRRE-SACASA (Sensational Spider-Man; HBO’s Big Love) and artwork by MIKE PERKINS (Captain America)!
32 PGS./Cardstock Cover/Parental Advisory…$3.99 Published by arrangement with The Doubleday Broadway Publishing Group, a division of Random House, Inc. This graphic novel is produced under licensefrom The Doubleday Broadway Publishing Group and Stephen King. TM & © 2010 Marvel Characters, Inc. All rights reserved.
